name: Asmae Kirimov
welcome_section_title: Welcome to the Law Office of
welcome_section_subtitle: Your Trusted Legal Partner in France
welcome_section_description: Providing expert legal advice and representation for individuals and businesses with clarity, dedication, and professionalism.
expertises_section_description_1: Expert legal advice and representation with clarity and professionalism.
expertises_section_description_2: Clear, dedicated legal support for immigration and nationality cases.
expertises_section_description_3: Professional legal guidance for public sector employees and services.
expertises_section_description_4: Compassionate and expert representation for personal injury claims.

cabinet_page_description_1: A graduate of the Aliénor Law School in Bordeaux and holder of a Master's degree in European and international law, Maitre KIRIMOV advises, assists and defends you before all administrative jurisdictions as well as before the judicial courts.
cabinet_page_description_2: Maître Kirimov also offers to defend your interests in the context of various daily life matters (disputes arising in the context of the purchase or sale of a movable or immovable property, neighbourhood disturbances, civil liability).
cabinet_page_description_3: Thanks to her professional experience within law firms, the French administration or an administrative court, Maitre Kirimov offers her skills in advice and litigation in various areas of administrative law (law on foreigners and nationality, town planning law, civil service law, etc.)
